inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient will be randomized to receive one of the 2 double-blinded treatments: Albuterol-HFA (Treatment T) or Proventil-HFA (Treatment R).

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The entire study consists of a Screening Period, a Run-in Period, and a Study Period which consists of three (3) Clinical Visits.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Forced Expiratory Volume at 1st Second (FEV1) will be measured in triplicate, with additional attempts if necessary.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The Screening Baseline FEV1 should fall within 50.0%-100.0% of the predicted value to qualify the subject.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient needs to demonstrate an FEV1 reversibility of greater than or equal to 12.0%, from the (same-day) Screening Baseline FEV1.

inclusion.criterion: SERIAL FEV1 MEASUREMENTS OF STUDY DRUG EFFICACY
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Serial FEV1 measurements of study drug efficacy will be performed at Visit 1 and 3.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient has asthma diagnosed a year ago, but it is not mentioned as significant or nonreversible.

exclusion.criterion: CONCURRENT CLINICALLY SIGNIFICANT CARDIOVASCULAR, HEMATOLOGICAL, RENAL, NEUROLOGICAL, HEPATIC, AND ENDOCRINE DISORDERS
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: The patient's past medical history is non-significant.

exclusion.criterion: KNOWN INTOLERANCE OR HYPERSENSITIVITY TO ANY COMPONENT OF THE MDI FORMULATION
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: There is no mention of known intolerance or hypersensitivity to any component of the MDI formulation.

notes: The patient has asthma diagnosed a year ago and presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough. He didn't respond to the usual corticosteroid inhaler.
